TopicTitle: [Mod Request] Plugin for excusing resources from dV calculators

Articles.Content:
It is a given that engines that consume ElectricCharge don't have their shown dV limited by how much or how little (even zero) ElectricCharge is currently in the vessel, however, I make heavy use of ThermalPower (which is massless and represents energy, just as ElectricCharge) and dV calculators tend to come up with < 10m/s because volume density of tanked ThermalPower for engines is quite low and KSP seems hardcoded to treat ElectricCharge a certain way.

If anyone is willing and able, it would be very welcome if this feature could be extracted from KSPIE and released standalone or written anew and made to easily allow resources including, but not limited to ThermalPower to be treated as ElectricCharge is. I'd like to eventually use other resources similarly and make or update several parts to use them, hence this request.
Just the stock one or modded ones like mechjeb’s?

On 3/7/2024 at 3:31 PM, SpaceNerd032 said:

Just the stock one or modded ones like mechjeb’s?

Any, but personally, I prefer KER

1 hour ago, JadeOfMaar said:

Any, but personally, I prefer KER

I could try to make a plugin to do that but I can’t guarantee that it will work with KER
